'''Captain Angfor''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The former captain of ''Impostor's Lament'', Angfor and his crew were forced to land on [Tangaloa Island](/tangaloaIsland/) after their ship sank. Without relief or a supply of food, they were forced to subsist on a diet of each other, slowly forming a terrifying cannibal cult.
